meanings.definition: Pertaining to or resembling the dawn.
meanings.sent1: The aurorean sky signaled the start of a new day.
meanings.sent2: The aurorean light slowly brightened the horizon.
meanings.sent3: The aurorean glow painted the sky in soft hues.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as aurorean as the morning sky.
meanings.sent5: The aurorean colors of dawn danced across the clouds.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the aurora borealis.
meanings.sent1: The aurorean lights shimmered in the northern sky.
meanings.sent2: We were amazed by the aurorean display in the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The aurorean spectacle left us in awe of nature's beauty.
meanings.sent4: The aurorean curtains of light draped the sky like a celestial tapestry.
meanings.sent5: The aurorean magic of the aurora borealis captivated our hearts.

meanings.definition: Characterized by a rosy or pinkish color.
meanings.sent1: Her cheeks turned a lovely aurorean shade when she blushed.
meanings.sent2: The aurorean hues of the sunset painted the evening sky.
meanings.sent3: The aurorean tint of the flowers made the garden look enchanting.
meanings.sent4: The aurorean blush on the horizon hinted at a beautiful evening ahead.
meanings.sent5: The aurorean glow of the room created a warm and cozy atmosphere.
